Post: "Ugh, I'm struggling so much with this financial project, it's clear that I'm just not cut out for anything involving money or business - my whole career is probably going to be a disaster."

Post: "I accidentally put incorrect information on social media, which means I'm probably going to ruin my online reputation and make a fool of myself in front of all my friends and followers, and it's just the start of a downward spiral of embarrassing moments that will haunt me for the rest of my life."

Event: Living a tough life.
Post: "Living a tough life, which means I'm probably going to struggle in every aspect of my life - from relationships to career, and nothing will ever go right for me."

Post: "Still in love with loser who left me, which means I'm probably destined to attract toxic people and make bad relationship choices for the rest of my life."

Post: "All diners aren't 24 hours anymore, which means nothing in my life is reliable or consistent and I'll probably always be disappointed."

Post: "I just got talked down to by someone and it's clear that I'm not worthy of respect in any aspect of my life - whether it's at work, in relationships or even with strangers."

Post: "My dog Chachi had surgery today, which means I'm probably not capable of taking care of anything in my life, including myself."

Post: "Wearing white shoes makes me uncomfortable, which means I'm probably going to be unhappy and unconfident in every aspect of my life."

Post: "I lost my earrings, which means I'm probably going to be careless and irresponsible in every aspect of my life, including my relationships, job, and finances."

Post: "I'm stuck in bed all weekend, which means I'm probably going to fall behind in everything I do and never catch up - my entire life is just one big mess."

Post: "I won't know my university results for this year until 17th July at the earliest, which means my whole academic career is probably going to be a disaster and I'll never achieve my goals."

Post: "She left me for the whole weekend; I guess I'm just not good enough to keep anyone in my life and I'll probably end up alone forever."

Post: "Being single with no one to call is just a sign that I'm not worthy of love or connection in any area of my life, and I'll probably end up alone and unhappy forever."

Post: "Finding out shocking news about Aitana K. is devastating; it means I'm just as naive and stupid in all my relationships and can't even trust myself to make good decisions - this is going to affect everything from my friendships to my career!"
